title: Textile, 1900–65
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered on plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Red cotton panel, probably a sarong, brocaded in all-over black zigzag pattern. One end elaborately decorated with wide band, running full width, embroidered in white, pink, green, yellow, blue, and gold. Another band of plain red follows. Two widths pieced in the middle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1900–65.
1900–65. Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered on plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). Gift of Mrs. Calvin Stillman. 1965-24-18.
